import React from 'react' import {useDispatch,useSelector} from 'react-redux' import {LinkContainer} from 'react-router-bootstrap' import {Navbar,Nav,Container} from 'react-bootstrap' const Header = () => { const userLogin=useSelector(state=>state.userLogin) const {userInfo}=userLogin return
ProShop
Cart {userInfo ? ( ): Sign In }
} export default Header
